page.shortlink: UX Properties Prompt before computing data binding code
page.topic: Prompt before computing data binding code
page.description: Display a confirmation prompt before computing the data binding code. If your UX is bound to a complex data structure, computing the data binding code can be relatively time consuming. If you have made minor edits to the UX that do not affect any of the data binding, you will not need to recompute the data binding code each time you save the UX in the builder.
